greeting: Hi there! I'm Jam's AI assistant. How can I help you today?

features.description: Jam Analytics offers the following powerful features:
list: Smart Workflow Generation: AI-powered workflow creation and optimization
Seamless Integration Hub: Connect with your existing tools effortlessly
Custom Analytics Dashboard: Real-time insights and reporting
Automated Task Management: Let AI handle your routine tasks
Role-Based Access Control: Secure and granular permissions

steps: Describe your business needs: Tell us about your business type and requirements
AI generates custom solution: Our AI analyzes and creates your perfect workflow
Launch and customize: Use and modify your application in real-time

pricing.description: Jam Analytics offers simple, transparent pricing plans:

launch: Jam Analytics is launching soon! Join our waitlist to be notified when we launch.
free_trial: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with our Pro and Enterprise plans.
